HediffDef.label: Race: Varag
HediffDef.description:
Varag are brutish Goblinoids similar to Goblins that aren't capable of much mentally. They make up for this in durability.
- 50% Psychic Sensitivity
- 110% Health Scale
- 90% Body Size
- 10% Global Learning Speed
- Wider Temp Tolerance
- 1 trait slot

Ascension:
 Can be ascended into a Goblin by an Orc. Ascension requires the races experience bar be filled first, which can be done by having them perform tasks they have a passion in.
